stepLabel: Practice Drawing with the Apple Pencil!
instructions: Use the blank screen below as a drawing pad and practice drawing with the Apple Pencil! Treat the screen as just a normal piece of paper. Try writing your name, or drawing a circle to the best of your ability!

stepLabel: Encoding Step 1 - Initial Shape Testing & Level Placement
instructions: Trace the figure below as accurately as possible.

stepLabel: Encoding Step 2 - Encoding of Highest Difficulty Level Shape Achieved
instructions: Trace the figure below as accurately as possible.

stepLabel: Encoding Step 3 - Free Hand Drawing of Highest Difficulty Level Shape Achieved
instructions: Draw the figure presented in the template section as accurately as possible.

stepLabel: Encoding Step 3 - Free Hand Drawing of Highest Difficulty Level Shape Achieved
instructions: From memory, draw the figure from the previous step as accurately as possible.

For this part of the test, after reading the following instructions, please hand the iPad to the test administrator (do not press the Start button!). After you complete this task, listen to the administrator for further instructions. 
 
 Complete the following task:  
 
 - Count backwards from 100 by 7s.

Complete the following task:  
 
 - Alternate letters and numbers through the entire alphabet (i.e. a1, b2, c3, d4, etc.)

Complete the following task:  
 
 - Listen to the following list of words, paying special attention to the order in which the words appear: 

 	 Idea, Skin, Water, Diesel, Brown
Reproduce the last figure from the encoding step you drew from memory to the best of your ability.
Which of the follow best matches the last figure you drew from the encoding step? (Record time till decision?)
